Empathetic Problem Solver

Innovative software and hardware solutions for those who need them.



My name is Brentyn and I love to get into the technical details!

I am looking for both work and clients!

What I Do :

Designing smart solutions for complex problems, from installing specialized hardware to implementing custom software. Fundamentally, I enjoy solving people's problems.

Software Dev

Can bring a website or app to life from design, programming, to solutions like hosting and DNS management.

Empathetic

Listens to needs and considerations deeply to create an effective solution that is elegantly functional.

Hardware Guru

Automate systems or setup IT infrastructure: PCs, servers, switches, routers, microcomputers, gaming, etc.

Community above all else.

Helping others is imperative, no matter where.
To give back, I help where I can. I'm happy to field any questions. I also offer upto 70% off any of my adjustable business services for nonprofits, charities, and other giving organizations.
